page.title: 04LOCAL POLEGATE NEWS
page.content: {IN POLEGATE}GROUPS ARE ARRANGING A SPECIAL COFFEE MORNING AT THE COMMUNITY CENTRE. THE PROCEEDS WILL BE GIVEN TO ST. WILFRID'S HOSPICE IN MEMORY OF A POPULAR NURSE WHO DIED AT THE HOSPICE AT THE AGE OF 52. {A MARATHON SNOOKER MATCH}WAS HELD FOR SOME AIDS FOR GUY'S HOSPITAL IN LONDON. IT'S GOING TO GO ON CONTINUOU- SLY FOR 24 HOURS. {THE STREET LIGHTS}ARE GOING TO STAY ON LONGER IN THE PARISH, THE COUNCIL HAS AGREED. THEY WILL STAY ON UNTIL 1am. {A PUBLIC MEETING}WAS HELD TO SAY "HANDS OFF OUR PARISH". IT IS PROPOSED TO PUT A MAJOR ROAD THROUGH POLEGATE. IT WILL KNOCK DOWN 2 HOUSES INCLUDING THE HOUSE I LIVE IN! IT WILL KNOCK DOWN A FARM TOO. THE ROAD IS SUPPOSED TO GO THROUGH IN 1989 BUT THE ACTUAL ROUTE OF THE BYPASS HAS NOT BEEN FINAL ISED.
